moduleMetadataJson.name: Windows Manage Certificate Authority Removal
moduleMetadataJson.description:
This module allows the attacker to remove an arbitrary CA certificate
        from the victim's Trusted Root store.
author: vt <nick.freeman@security-assessment.com>

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: SESSION
options.description: The session to run this module on.

options.name: CERTID
options.description: SHA1 hash of the certificate to remove.
